articles.title: Coronavirus: Two hairstylists expose 140 clients to COVID-19 - WSB Atlanta
articles.description: One stylist is also known to have visited a local Dairy Queen, a Walmart and a gym.
articles.content:
SPRINGFIELD, Mo. — Two hairstylists who tested positive for COVID-19 may have exposed 140 customers to the virus.
The stylists worked at the same Great Clips salon location in Springfield, Missouri.… [+1388 chars]
